verses.roman:
eka-dina mahāprabhu nityānande lañā
dui bhāi yukti kaila nibhṛte vasiyā

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nityānande lañā—taking Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; dui bhāi—two brothers; yukti kaila—consulted; nibhṛte vasiyā—sitting in a solitary place.
translation: One day the two brothers, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and Nityānanda Prabhu, consulted one another, sitting together in a solitary place.
